title: Queue Update - 2017-10-15 (Ranked TT, Normal Draft)
body:
~~~
#Normal Draft
~~~
**TL;DR:**
After our [recent changes,](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/glATfXAE-queue-changes-draft-update-ranked-change) we’ve found that Normal Draft is doing even better than we expected! We're going to extend the time the queue is available for the[ remainder of the test period.](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/WEAy3U0l-normal-draft-test-coming-to-oceania) From today until 2017/10/19, the queue will run from 11am-3am AEDT. At that point, we will look at the data and make a decision around the ongoing time for the queue. 
~~~
After our mos[t recent changes,](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/glATfXAE-queue-changes-draft-update-ranked-change)  we've been able to monitor the impact to the quality of the queue. 

* We’ve seen that the breakdown of games between blind and draft has remained pretty stable after the changes. (Around the 17% mentioned in the[ last update)](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/glATfXAE-queue-changes-draft-update-ranked-change) 
* The quality of the matchmaking and queue times remained acceptable during the greatly extended time period the queue was available. 

Because of this, we’re planning on pushing the available time for the queue even further for the remainder of the time period. We're uncertain that the matchmaking quality and queue times will remain acceptable during this entire time period - but we want to push as hard as possible to have as many modes available for as long as possible.  This will allow us to get data to make a final decision of where to end up at the end of the test period. 

# So from 2017/10/15 until 2017/10/18 Normal Draft will be on EVERYDAY from 11am to 3am AEDT. After 19/10/2017, we will assess how this change went and decide on the ongoing availability of the queue. #
~~~
#Twisted Treeline#
~~~
**TL;DR:**
We're enabling Twisted Treeline on Saturday and Sunday for the remainder of the 2017 Season (until (2017/11/07). We want to have the mode open as much as possible to allow for everyone to obtain end of season rewards. Since rewards were announced, there has been an increased of players in Twisted Treeline, and we're confident the queue will be able to handle this increase until the end of the season.
~~~
After the announcement of  [end of season rewards, ](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends-november-7)there has been renewed interest in Twisted Treeline Ranked Flex. We've seen a large increase in players taking part in the mode during the last week. 

We’re confident that this level of interest in the queue will allow us to temporarily extend the availability of the mode until the end of the season. without impacting matchmaking quality or queue times.

## So from 2017/10/15 until 2017/11/05 Twisted Treeline Flex Ranked will be now be on Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday from 5pm to Midnight AEDT. ##

After 2017/11/05, we will analyse the impact of this change and make a decision around availability in preseason.  Good luck with your final push up the ranks!

~~~

To get all the info about when which queues are on check out the [Queue Schedule post](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/wgM0WBsO-queue-schedule-updated-feb-8th).

Please keep sharing feedback with us around queue times - and support your favourite queue by playing it. We want to have as much availability of queues as possible, while keeping a high quality of matchmaking and low queue times - and your feedback helps us reach the best possible outcomes!

replies.body:
YAYY!!

My gold + Twisted Treeline dreams are achievable now !!

TY rito :D
It's almost like there was never that big an issue with draft queues and your removal of it was purely for bad reasons.

I'm certain you've been around for this discussion before and seen us talk about the issues. Recently broke this down again [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/WEAy3U0l-normal-draft-test-coming-to-oceania?comment=000c000000000000).

Draft with role select is much, much more popular than the old draft in NA, and when measured against its previous time in OCE. This is the primary reason we saw it possibly working here. Even still, OCE's taste for draft doesn't come anywhere near close to other regions. But it is enough to continue to test the limits of the queue for now.

Yeah sure whatever but here are the facts.

Draft was removed because of teambuilder (sure you tried saying that it wasn't because of this, but it was so blatantly obvious).

Teambuilder failed.

You didn't put draft back in.

2 years later you are just now putting draft back on, and realizing that like we were telling you, there was nothing wrong with draft in the first place.

You got two facts right: Teambuilder failed, and we didn't bring back draft. The rest is your opinion.

Draft was removed at the recommendation of matchmaking experts in Central Riot. We were the first region to start doing limited time queues due to our low population, and there wasn't a good precedent for what the teams in Central were seeing happen to Draft. Imagine a line going down and to the right at a sharp angle, that was Draft.
Most OCE players showed us they didn't want draft anymore when they stopped playing the queue, just like Teambuilder. Sure there might have been a die-hard group of Draft players that could have kept it running a few hours a week, and if I could go back and had my way I would have put Draft up 1 night a week because that's how much it would have been able to sustain at the rate it was going, but at least it would have still been around.

Teambuilder went live in OCE because we believed it was a better Blind experience and wanted to give it a shot. Problem is it required 5 times as many players in queue as Blind pick would to achieve minimum queue health. So we would have required at least half of the Blind pick players to switch to it to make it really healthy all week. Draft had so few players in it that removing it would have had a negligible effect on the health of Teambuilder. It was a non-factor, plain and simple.

Teambuilder definitely stayed up longer than it should have and is what happens when people slowly drain out of a queue. It becomes almost impossible to find a game. This is why queues are restricted or removed and it should be a memorable example of why, for instance, TT isn't on every day all day and why Draft was removed.
Having Twisted treeline on weekends has actually made me return to league of legends from other games. Thanks riot!
Soooo, why isnt ranked TT currently online??
I see it online now, and it was definitely online at the changeover time at 5pm. Can you let me know what you're seeing now / when you couldn't see it?

my bad, I was under the impression it would have stated in the select screen it was ranked, just had to proceed to the lobby
Thanks Zaps
No worries! Unfortunately it's a limitation at the moment that the pick mode will only show if there's more than one mode available.
Buff Vi on TT please {{champion:254}} {{item:3078}}
we had twisted treeline ranked? wooooo {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

What may confuse you about it is there is no Twisted Treeline Normals, if you're playing it you're playing Ranked because that's the only mode in that queue. Since the queue times would be too long if the had both Normals and Ranked it used to be Normals only, but then the people who were playing it wanted to know how they were stacking up comparatively and Riot agreed and made it a Ranked only queue.

This is not accurate. While it is true that we never have both modes on at the same time, it's not true that we no longer have the Normal queue.

Tuesday and Wednesday are normal TT.
Thursday and Friday (and Saturday/Sunday until end of season!) are Ranked TT.

We don't have both modes enabled at the same time because many of the same players play both modes. If they were on at the same time, the same players would be split between two modes, and this would further reduce the time that the modes could be on for.
I still don't see why dominion couldn't have been left on in custom maps >_> I really miss Hide and Seek
As Do I.
Hey so... may want to format your dates correctly. In OCE it's dd/mm/yy, not yy/mm/dd.
10 minute queues for draft. Good one riot. Broken.

You're definitely an outlier in regards to queue time. Most players have much lower queue times.

Such is the effect of less popular queues running over longer hours. If there isn't anyone to match, you won't get a match!

There are some players that don't care about queue times, they just want to have the mode on as long as possible. Others, like yourself, expect that if a queue is open they will get a good queue time and matchmaking experience. We're trying to meet both kinds of players in the middle here with the current schedule.

Whats going on with this queue? i waited 25+ mins only to get a remake and then another 20 mins to get a game, I came back from NA server cause i am sick of playing on 200+ ping but whats the point if i can only play 2 games a day, might as well go back to the 200 ping, atleast i can get more than one or 2 a day.

Can you let me know a bit more about when you had these queue times? I'm assuming you're playing Normal draft here. 

This looks like a super big outlier from the data that we've been looking at when making our timing choices.

I wanted to leave some thoughts on my experience with it so far. I'm glad to see something similar to team builder, so I have more control on what roles and champions I want to play. However after queueing up 5 times with mid as first preference and support as second, I have always ended up with support. I have dodged queue all but one game and kept ending up with support (sorry to lengthen other people's queues, but I wanted mid for a change).

I understand that support isn't an often preferred role but if I am going to be placed as support all the time I may as well have it as my primary preference. It almost feels like my mid preference isn't there. I am almost tempted to simply choose mid then top as my preference so that I don't always get filled into support (even though top isn't something I want).

I just feel like if you get shoved into your secondary preference all the time like support but really wanted to play your first preference such as mid, it doesn't really happen since other people want mid so you get shifted to support.
Thank god my favourite game mode is finally more playable! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
SeemsGood
I know it's a long shot, but can we get support gold gen items disabled in tt. Support meta too stronk.
